item.title: Airport authorities impose 24-hour visitor ban for Tarique’s homecoming
item.description: Authorities have banned visitors at Shahjalal International Airport for 24 hours to manage crowds ahead of BNP Acting Chairman Tarique Rahman’s return to the country. According to a statement on Tuesday, authorities said the restriction will be in place from 6pm on Dec 24 to 6pm on Dec 25.

item.title: ECNEC okays Tk 354.65 billion project to modernise Eastern Refinery
item.description: The Executive Committee of the National Economic Council (ECNEC) on Tuesday approved a Tk 354.65 billion project to modernise and expand Eastern Refinery Limited (ERL), aiming to strengthen Bangladesh's energy security, produce cleaner fuel and cut dependence on imported refined petroleum products.
